/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Trees and bushes add a touch of green to the urban landscape, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
